name: Roanoke (itch)
description:
Game developed by with the help of two friends for the Summer Edition (2016) of My First Game Jam.

Prototype for a very extendable colony simulation. Currently gameplay is to build some resource collecting buildings and prepare for the arrival of the next wave of colonists.

Programming and graphics by Filip Gökstorp, design by Filip Gökstorp and Ben Erlebach. Music by Frances O'Sullivan.

Build on LibGDX.
